subject: Questions about Simsonn Plus X Pedals
description_text:
Hello,

I would like to order the Simsonn Plus X Pedals from your website to my country Jordan. I would like to ask a few questions:


  1.
Is it possible to ship to Amman, Jordan?
  2.
How can I specify to use DHL Express for the logistics carrier (as DHL acts as broker and handles customs declaration in my country)?
  3.
Also will the baseplate be able to be mounted on a PXN-A10 wheel stand?

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10271 中
